requestBody.title: Owner validates financial/reporting outputs API Trace

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

resultPayload.note: Demand-pricing policy configured and verified through API + agent tools.

data.instruction: Set demand pricing rules (for example peak-hour/holiday overrides) and verify they can be applied to bookable offers.
data.expectedResult: Demand pricing policy exists and can influence offer/booking totals.

resultPayload.note: Demand-pricing policy configured and verified through API + agent tools.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "SMS/app notifications when number approaching ("You're 3 away")". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
